Detailed Description

The base class for exception types.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

cubescript::exception::exception ( const char *  key  ) 

Parameters:
key The error key string. Error keys are strings composed of dot-separated labels, where each label identifies an error class/category. The first, left-most, label is the base error type (i.e. parse, logic or runtime error), and subsequent labels provide more specific error information. Label syntax: only alphanumeric characters allowed.

Member Function Documentation

Returns:
key The argument that was passed to the constructor.
